children.markdown:
So, we have a little video-making contest on the go here at RBI. The [Flight Group](http://www.flightglobal.com/Home/Default.aspx) have put up this little effort of two of its journalists flying a 737-NG flight simualtor, which is interesting viewing:

<object height="350" width="425"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/x5QxMndQdDM"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><embed height="350" src="http://www.youtube.com/v/x5QxMndQdDM" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" wmode="transparent"></embed></object>

And the truly masochistic amongst you might just enjoy the [*Travel Weekly*](http://www.travelweekly.co.uk/Home/Default.aspx) team singing Hotel Tropicana:

<object height="350" width="425"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/2Zzi9AaE52A"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><embed height="350" src="http://www.youtube.com/v/2Zzi9AaE52A" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" wmode="transparent"></embed></object>

(Or you could check out [their blog](http://www.travelweekly.co.uk/blogs/), which is a lot less likely to make your ears bleed.)
